name: react-kana-provider
description: A tiny React context provider to create better Japanese form
author: ohbarye <over.rye@gmail.com>

scripts.publish:patch: yarn run build && npm version patch && git push origin master && git push origin --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:minor: yarn run build && npm version minor && git push origin master && git push origin --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:major: yarn run build && npm version major && git push origin master && git push origin --tags && npm publish --access=public
